pr_title: using fake client for downloading scanner

timeline.message: using fake client for downloading scanner

timeline.bodyText: Why call it "Fake"? I'd prefer DetectBlackDuckHttpClient.
timeline.author: taikuukaits
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Or BlackDuckHttpClientWrapper.  I'm running into a build issue using the latest blackduck-common too.
replies.author: psantos1113
